resources.string:
* If the current price breaks the resistance of any level you can long (or) buy
* If the current price breaks the support of any level you can short (or) sell
* But if the current price is in consolidation zone better take position after it breaks 0.786 (or) 0.888 level
* And after taking position set target for next resistance (or) support
* Same goes for stop loss also set in previous resistance (or) support

* If the current price breaks the resistance of any level you can long (or) buy\n* If the current price breaks the support of any level you can short (or) sell\n* Same goes for stop loss also set in previous resistance (or) support
1. Probability of wining in the buy trade is more when current slope is below median\n2. Probability of wining in the sell trade is more when current slope is above median
